message.name: ERR_SPECIALCAUTION_XFV_END_DATE_EARLIER_THAN_START_DATE
message.locale: The End Date, %1d, must be on or after the Start Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_SPECIALCAUTION_XFV_START_DATE_GREATER_THAN_CURRENT_DATE
message.locale: The Start Date, %1d, must be on or before today.

message.name: ERR_SPECIALCAUTION_XFV_END_DATE_GREATER_THAN_CURRENT_DATE
message.locale: The End Date, %1d, must be on or before today.

message.name: ERR_SPECIALCAUTION_XRV_START_DATE_BEFORE_BIRTH_DATE
message.locale: The Start Date, %1d, must be after person's date of birth, %2d.

message.name: ERR_SPECIALCAUTION_XRV_CATEGORY_CODE_AND_TYPE_CODE_EXIST
message.locale: The Special Caution category, "%1s" and type, "%2s" already exist for the start date, %3d as active.

message.name: ERR_SPECIALCAUTION_XRV_CATEGORY_AND_TYPE_OVERLAPS_IN_SPECIFIED_DATE_RANGE
message.locale: A Special Caution with a category of "%1s", and type of "%2s", already exists which overlaps with the time period specified.

message.name: ERR_SPECIALCAUTION_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_CREATE
message.locale: New Special Caution cannot be added for a client that is currently marked as a duplicate.

message.name: ERR_SPECIALCAUTION_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_MODIFY
message.locale: Special Caution details of a client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_SPECIALCAUTION_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_DELETE
message.locale: Special Caution details for a client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_SPECIALCAUTION_XRV_PROSPECT_PERSON_NOT_REGISTERED_AS_PERSON
message.locale: A Special Caution cannot be created for a Prospect Person. Please register the Prospect Person as a Person.
